Instructions: Heat a large skillet over high heat.
Add the beef and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned.
Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
Add the oil to the skillet and heat until hot.
Add the ginger and bell peppers and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes.
Add the oregano and salt and pepper, to taste.
Add the beef back to the skillet and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes.
